name: Universal Media Technologies Inc
overview:
UMT provides Onsite Tech and Remote Information Technology Support Services, Managed IT Services & Technology Sales, Wired and Wireless Solutions, Data Back-Up & Recovery.

Our Services Include: Desktop, Laptop Computer and Network Management Supported by Virtual Remote Connection or Onsite Technical Service Solutions, wired and wireless solutions, data back-up & recovery, proactively managing, maintaining and supporting all aspects of your technology infrastructure designing & deploying, rolling out your new small & medium business network.

Our goal is to work with a wide range of clientele from small home office to small and medium enterprise, and private entities.

Universal Media Technologies officially Incorporated on July 4th, 2007, in Burlington, Ontario, Canada and is privately owned and operated by George Milkovich.

We Make Technology Work for You!

Vist us on the web: (www.universalmediatech.com)
